comment._content: I wonder if these were polygamists going to Mexico.  Would love to know the story behind this picture.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: No, these Mormons were refugees from Mexico. In addition to numerous Mexican refugees, 2,000 Mormons sought refuge in El Paso in 1912, going there from Mexico to escape dangers in the border areas during the Mexican revolution that started in 1911. www.elpasotexas.gov/history/mexicanrevolution/history.asp
